casebody.data:
No. 09-8314. Johnny L. Ruffin, Petitioner v. David DiGuglielmo, Superintendent, State Correctional Institution at Graterford, et al. 559 U.S. 953, 130 S. Ct. 1542,

176 L. Ed. 2d 136,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 1170, February 22, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit denied.
